div.div: Habitat-based reconstruction of Atlantic bluefin tuna abundance.
div.p: Coefficient of linear correlation ( r) and its associated probability ( P) between historical records of Atlantic bluefin tuna abundance (from Fig. 1; black line) and long-term changes (1891–2011) in the species’ habitat suitability (orange line) reconstructed from the PCA computed on annual anomalies of probability of occurrence of bluefin tuna.
